item.title: Italian Erasmus
item.description: Italian Erasmus is a national mobility programme that allows students to carry out mobility periods at other affiliated Italian universities.%0AThe call for applications and all other information are available on the Italian Erasmus page.%0ADeadline for applications: 18th July 2025.%0A

item.title: Maker Faire Rome: applications open until July 7, 2025
item.description: Applications are now open for Maker Faire Rome, the exhibition that celebrates the most innovative projects from public universities and research institutes.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Virgilio Program 2025/26: Ranking list
item.description: The Selection Committee for the Virgilio Program 2025-26 gathered on May 15th 2025 at 12.30 am to screen applications and select applicants. Please find below the final ranking list, including the names of all applicants selected for the Virgilio Program 2025-26. %0A%0AüìÑ Virgilio program - Ranking linst 2025/26

item.title: Dual Career programme for student-athletes
item.description: As of 15 July 2025, students can submit their application for the Dual Career programme, aimed at supporting high-level athletes in balancing their competitive sports commitments with university career.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it
